revision.comment: Omega moved page [[IPPea TV]] to [[IPPea AirPea TV Stick (AP1000)]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=iPPea |model=AirPea TV Stick |revision=(AP1000) |asin=B00FZJF7PE;DE;,B01AONK7VY;JP;, |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/30/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=computer-on-a-stick, media streamer, media player |fcc_id=O66-IP10 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ingenic |cpu1_model=JZ4770 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=2 GiB |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G63EFR-S6C |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, microSD, |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=HDMI out, microSD Card slot |stock_boot= |stock_os=Android;4.0.3;Ice Cream Sandwich; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AirPea TV Android HDMI Stick}} :''AirPea Mini Cloud Dongle (AP1000)'' *[http://www.ippea.com iPPea Home page]
The wireless chip used in this device appears to be a ''[[Broadcom]]'' chip. :The processor is not identifiable (except for the manuf.), :but it [http://www.cnx-software.com/2012/07/10/ippea-tv-android-4-0-3-hdmi-stick-based-on-ingenic-jz4770-mips-sells-for-50-usd/ appears to be the JZ4770] ([http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ingenic_Semiconductor see also Wikipedia]).
There is an '''ITE''' HDMI chip on-board. :There is also a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USB_On-The-Go USB OTG] (Micro-B) port on-board.
Devices may vary in NAND flash quantity ([http://www.ippea.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/iPPea-TV-sepc-2012.jpg 2GB] vs [http://www.ippea.com/ippea-tv-upgade-4gb-price-unchanged 4GB]).
:See also [[Vogue Media Player]] ([http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?22222-LCD-(OLED-amp-TFT)-%EC%EE%ED%E8%F2%EE%F0-%E4%EB%FF-%F0%EE%F3%F2%E5%F0%E0-Asus&langid=3&p=234959#post234959 On '''wl500g.info''' forums])
==Images== <gallery caption="from iPPea"> File:IPPea_TV.jpg|spec. leaflet </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]]
{{lowercase}}
